Posts.Content: Hi Laura, I have just found this forum. I was also diagnosed with this 2 years ago. There is a forum specific to rare cancers and includes a very informative group on this particular type of breast cancer. www.rarecancer.org will get you to it. As you may know by now, this form of cancer in the breast is much less agressive than other types of breast cancer or Adenoid Cystic Cancer elsewhere in the body. Trust you are still doing ok.
Posts.Title: Adenoid Cystic Carcinoma in the Breast
